text: Fomɨra Atrivim Jotam ko, Atrivim Ahas ko, Atrivim Hesekia me vaghvagha Judan gumazamizibagh ativagha men atrivibar ikezir dughiabar, Ikiavɨra Itir God mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam isa Maika ganɨngi, Maika a Moresetɨn nguibamɨn gumazir mam. Ikiavɨra Itir God Samarian nguibar ekiam ko, Jerusalemɨn nguibar ekiamɨn otivamin bizibar gun Maika mɨgei.
